actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Tentacle Lash attack and one Void Bite attack or it makes three Void Spit attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle Lash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 12 (2d6+5) bludgeoning damage + 7 (2d6) psychic and target blinded until end of its next turn as jumbled visions and voices of the Void fill its mind (DC 15 Int not blind).

actions.name: Void Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (1d10+5) piercing damage + 9 (2d8) necrotic.

actions.name: Void Spit
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 12 (2d8+3) necrotic.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Tentacle Senses
special_abilities.desc: Can't use its tremorsense while grappled or restrained.
